# Pull Request

## Description

**What does this PR do?**

Provide a clear and concise description of your changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] TypeScript compiles without errors (`pnpm tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] Rust compiles without warnings (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] ESLint passes (`pnpm lint`)

### Testing
- [ ] Tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] New functionality includes tests
- [ ] Edge cases are covered

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with my changes
- [ ] Code comments are clear and helpful

### Tauri/Desktop Specific
- [ ] Tauri commands are properly typed
- [ ] IPC communication works correctly
- [ ] No blocking operations in async commands

Add screenshots or recordings of UI changes.

- [ ] Improves performance
- [ ] May impact performance (explain below)
